___name.description: A short unique name for the organism (e.g. 'mouse' or 'human').
___name.title: Name

___taxon_id.description: The NCBI taxon ID for the organism (e.g. 10090).
___taxon_id.title: Taxon ID

___scientific_name.description: The genus species for the organism (e.g. 'Mus musculus').
___scientific_name.title: Organism
